thread.title: The most wonderful staff of any hotel we've been to in ages!
thread.title_full: The most wonderful staff of any hotel we've been to in ages! - Review of The Kensington, London, England - TripAdvisor

author: annemilliken
title: The most wonderful staff of any hotel we've been to in ages!
text: Great location. Pleasant room with lots of light. Helpful and cheerful staff. Great restaurant, ask for Sandor . He's the king of all waiters. Intelligent, most capable and cheerful. Food is good too.
